name: fosaprepitant
content: Fosaprepitant, sold under the brand names Emend (US) and Ivemend (EU) among others, is an antiemetic medication, administered intravenously. It is a prodrug of aprepitant. Fosaprepitant was developed by Merck & Co. and was approved for medical use in the United States, and in the European Union in January 2008.   == References ==
